【MULTIFUNCTIONAL】Travel glassware is suitable for any occasion,any hot and cold drinks,Have a comfortable grip.Suitable for wine,champagne,breweries,cafes,bars and bubble tea etc.Set off on your refreshing picnic,hiking,camping,home or office.

【SATISFACTION & GUARANTEE】Your 100% satisfaction is Deitybless customer service team's top notch. We walk the extra mile to ensure our customers’ complete satisfaction. If you are not positively thrilled with our cups. Just let us know and we will issue a prompt replacement or full refund.
